thread.title: BRIEF-Centene Says Expects To Enter Undertakings With NY State Department. Of Health

title: BRIEF-Centene Says Expects To Enter Undertakings With NY State Department. Of Health
text:
Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Centene Says Expects To Enter Undertakings With NY State Department. Of Health Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 2 (Reuters) - Centene Corp: 
* AS PART OF REGULATORY APPROVAL PROCESS FOR FIDELIS CARE DEAL, IT IS EXPECTED THAT CO WILL ENTER UNDERTAKINGS WITH NY STATE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH 
* CENTENE SAYS EXPECTS ONE OF UNDERTAKINGS TO INCLUDE A $340 MLN CONTRIBUTION BY CO TO STATE OF NEW YORK TO BE PAID OVER A 5-YR PERIOD - SEC FILING 
* $340 MILLION CONTRIBUTION BY CENTENE IS FOR INITIATIVES TO PROVIDE HIGH QUALITY HEALTHCARE TO “VULNERABLE POPULATIONS WITHIN NEW YORK STATE” 
* UPON CLOSING OF FIDELIS CARE DEAL, FIDELIS CARE WILL OPERATE AS A FOR-PROFIT HEALTH INSURER IN NEW YORK Source text ( bit.ly/2uI5zM4 ) Further company coverage:
